description:
The API needs to allow filtering of the flavors collection by minDisk and minRam.

http://docs.openstack.org/cactus/openstack-compute/developer/openstack-compute-api-1.1/content/List_Flavors-d1e4188.html
title: OSAPI v1.1 Flavors Filtering

comments.content:
The API needs to allow filtering of the flavors collection by minDisk and minRam. This bug is blocked by bug 844924

http://docs.openstack.org/cactus/openstack-compute/developer/openstack-compute-api-1.1/content/List_Flavors-d1e4188.html
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~bcwaldon
